header_text: You and your spouse are planning a weekend trip to celebrate your anniversary. Planning the details of the trip is requiring a lot of thinking, and you feel particularly exhausted. You take a break to walk outside and return feeling refreshed.

elements.Text: Walking outside when you felt tired was...
